title: Vivo T1 launched in India with a 120Hz display and Snapdragon 695
content:
Vivo today introduced a new smartphone series in India called Vivo T. The first smartphone to launch under the new series is the Vivo T1, a budget-friendly offering that packs a good-looking design and competitive hardware. With a 120Hz high-refresh rate display, Snapdragon 695 SoC, and capable camera setup, the Vivo T1 looks like it

The post Vivo T1 launched in India with a 120Hz display and Snapdragon 695 appeared first on xda-developers.
description: The Vivo T2 offers a 6.58-inch 120Hz display, Snapdragon 695 SoC, up to 8GB RAM, a 5,000mAh battery and Android 12.
